plugins.name: Remove Clouds
plugins.descr:
Replaces the map clouds with empty models. This will cause no clouds to be displayed on the map. I recommend this as the clouds can block the view of objects on the map. 

Optionally, you could skip this and install A Quality World Map's Clear Map Skies optional file, but there are places such as Castle Volkihar which are obscured from view using that.

plugins.name: Notes
plugins.descr:
In addition to providing optimized LOD models for Aspens Ablaze, this AA add-on also replaces the 4K leaf normal of AA with an optimized 2K version having mipmaps generated using 127 alpha test threshold and no alpha transparency. This ensures consistency of both full and LOD aspen leaves at varying distance from the player PoV. 
- The Performance options only apply to DynDOLOD "Ultra" trees using 3D LOD options. Use the "Quality" option of this mod if "Billboard #" will be used for DynDOLOD tree mesh rules at LOD4|8|16, because 2D tree LOD meshes will always use only 8 triangles anyway.

plugins.name: Quality
plugins.descr:
LOD models based on the Aspens Ablaze full models, which have many triangles and significantly raise draw calls when using DynDOLOD 3D trees options ("Level 1|2|3" rather than "Billboard #"in LOD4|8|16).
- These will provide the best transitions at a cost to performance when using Ultra 3D trees in object LOD.

plugins.name: Performance
plugins.descr:
Optimized, lower poly LOD models. These will provide very good transitions at almost no performance cost when using Ultra 3D trees in object LOD.
- This option also uses optimized 256x256 leaf diffuse textures.

plugins.name: Normal
plugins.descr: Vanilla tree size

plugins.name: Big Trees
plugins.descr:
Larger TreeAspen01 and TreeAspen02
- This will come at even higher performance cost if the "Quality" performance option was selected previously.

plugins.name: Autumnal
plugins.descr:
True to vanilla Skyrim, Aspen LOD are yellow as in Fall in the real world.
- Choose this when using the "Autumnal" Leaf Color option from Aspens Ablaze.

plugins.name: Autumnal Variety
plugins.descr:
Aspen LOD are a mix of yellow/green, yellow, orange, and red. 
- Choose this when using the "Autumnal Variety" Leaf Color option from Aspens Ablaze.

plugins.name: Summer
plugins.descr:
Aspen LOD are yellow as in Summer in the real world.
- Choose this when using the "Summer" Leaf Color option from Aspens Ablaze.

plugins.name: Required Files
plugins.descr:
Audio Overhaul for Skyrim is an extensive sound overhaul aiming to make Skyrim's soundscape more immersive, clear, responsive, impactful and ultimately fun, while also aiming for maximum compatibility, performance and coherency with the original game. Ambience, weapons, magic, movement, reverb system, sound propagation, creatures and the overall mix are key areas of change.

These are the main files required to use the mod.

A "⭐" means the author strongly recommends the addon.

plugins.name: Engine Fixes
plugins.descr:
Engine Fixes is required for volume sliders to persist between saves. Otherwise, whenever you restart the game the volume sliders will reset to their default position. This is a bug present in the vanilla game and only addressed by Engine Fixes.

💬 – This doesn't actually install anything. Please make sure you downloaded the requirements listed on the mod page.

plugins.name: Sound Record Distributor
plugins.descr:
Sound Record Distributor is required to distribute ambient, magic, and weapon sounds on runtime, and ensure those sounds play in the event of a record conflict. Please read the mod page for a more in-depth explaination of what this plugin does.

💬 – This doesn't actually install anything. Please make sure you downloaded the requirements listed on the mod page.

plugins.name: Acoustic Space Improvement Fixes ⭐
plugins.descr:
Acoustic Space Improvement Fixes is a compatible, vanilla-friendly lookover of every interior cell to stop small homes and shops from sounding like castles and chasms. Ensures all interiors use a consistent reverb profile for consistency across the entire game.

💬 – This doesn't actually install anything. Please make sure you downloaded the requirements listed on the mod page.

plugins.name: Reverb Interior Sounds Expansion ⭐
plugins.descr:
Reverb Interior Sounds Expansion is a thoughtful, vanilla-friendly remodel of the base game reverb, extended ambience, interior sounds, and more. This is an improved upon and less exaggerated version of Audio Overhaul for Skyrim's iconic reverb profiles.

💬 – This doesn't actually install anything. Please make sure you downloaded the requirements listed on the mod page.

plugins.name: Enhanced Blood Textures
plugins.descr:
These are optional patches provided for Audio Overhaul for Skyrim that wouldn't be covered by Sound Record Distributor or are built into the mod. If an author provides a patch for your mod, you should probably download it.

💬 – This will take you to a new page where you can select your plugins!

plugins.name: Rumble Additions ⭐
plugins.descr:
These are optional patches provided for Audio Overhaul for Skyrim that wouldn't be covered by Sound Record Distributor or are built into the mod. If an author provides a patch for your mod, you should probably download it.

💬 – This will take you to a new page where you can select your plugins!

plugins.name: True Storms
plugins.descr:
These are optional patches provided for Audio Overhaul for Skyrim that wouldn't be covered by Sound Record Distributor or are built into the mod. If an author provides a patch for your mod, you should probably download it.

⚠️ Heads up! – This is a plugin that resolves a SINGLE-RECORD conflict between True Storms and Audio Overhaul for Skyrim. It ensures that stone interiors will use the new dampended interior reverb profile and not vanilla.

plugins.name: Standard or SPID Version
plugins.descr:
These are optional patches provided for Audio Overhaul for Skyrim that wouldn't be covered by Sound Record Distributor or are built into the mod. If an author provides a patch for your mod, you should probably download it.

💬 – Select the version you have installed.

plugins.name: Lite Version
plugins.descr:
These are optional patches provided for Audio Overhaul for Skyrim that wouldn't be covered by Sound Record Distributor or are built into the mod. If an author provides a patch for your mod, you should probably download it.

💬 – Select the version you have installed.

plugins.name: Crafting ⭐
plugins.descr:
These are the currently available addons for Rumble by doodlum, and SKSE plugin. Installing these will ensure that will ensure that most of the new sounds and conflicts added by Audio Overhaul are forwarded and given proper rumble send.

💬 - Load these plugins BEFORE the provided Immersive Sounds Compendium patches if you are an Immersive Sounds user.

plugins.name: Jumping
plugins.descr:
These are the currently available addons for Rumble by doodlum, and SKSE plugin. Installing these will ensure that will ensure that most of the new sounds and conflicts added by Audio Overhaul are forwarded and given proper rumble send.

💬 - Load these plugins BEFORE the provided Immersive Sounds Compendium patches if you are an Immersive Sounds user.

plugins.name: Swiming
plugins.descr:
These are the currently available addons for Rumble by doodlum, and SKSE plugin. Installing these will ensure that will ensure that most of the new sounds and conflicts added by Audio Overhaul are forwarded and given proper rumble send.

💬 - Load these plugins BEFORE the provided Immersive Sounds Compendium patches if you are an Immersive Sounds user.

plugins.name: Weapons ⭐
plugins.descr:
These are the currently available addons for Rumble by doodlum, and SKSE plugin. Installing these will ensure that will ensure that most of the new sounds and conflicts added by Audio Overhaul are forwarded and given proper rumble send.

💬 - Load these plugins BEFORE the provided Immersive Sounds Compendium patches if you are an Immersive Sounds user.

plugins.name: Thank You!
plugins.descr:
Thank you for installing Audio Overhaul for Skyrim!

Respect to David Jegutidse, lazygecko, aers, Doodlezoid, and everyone who submitted translations over the years!

plugins.descr:
An updated version of the patch included with Ultimate College of Winterhold, for Atlas Map Markers v3+.

Credit to themayor897 for Ultimate College of Winterhold and to Spacedroner for the original patch.

plugins.name: Install everything
plugins.descr: All special items and their variants as preferred by authors. Staff of Magnus and Dragon Priest Masks retextured by EmeraldReign.

plugins.name: Custom
plugins.descr: Choose which items and their variants you want to install.

plugins.name: Tsun's Armor
plugins.descr: This armor is not playable in the default game.

plugins.name: Staff of Magnus
plugins.descr: Retextured by EmeraldReign.

plugins.name: Dragon Priest Masks
plugins.descr: Retextured by EmeraldReign.

plugins.name: Desaturated Crown Texture - 512
plugins.descr:
Slightly desaturated texture for Barenziah's Crown to make it look less garish and more like proper gold. Otherwise unmodified from vanilla. 512x512 texture resolution, use this if your system can't handle 1k textures.
								
							Don't choose any option or for Mod Organizer users choose "None" below, if you prefer the vanilla textures or have a different texture replacer installed for Barenziah's Crown. Will only affect the gold base, not the gems.

plugins.name: Desaturated Crown Texture - 1k
plugins.descr:
Slightly desaturated texture for Barenziah's Crown to make it look less garish and more like proper gold. Otherwise unmodified from vanilla. 1024x1024 texture resolution, use this if you have the official HD DLC installed!

              Don't choose any option or for Mod Organizer users choose "None" below, if you prefer the vanilla textures or have a different texture replacer installed for Barenziah's Crown. Will only affect the gold base, not the gems.

plugins.name: Gamwich Crown Texture - 1k
plugins.descr:
Alternative texture for the crown made by Gamwich. 1024x1024 texture resolution.

              Don't choose any option or for Mod Organizer users choose "None" below, if you prefer the vanilla textures or have a different texture replacer installed for Barenziah's Crown. Will only affect the gold base, not the gems.

plugins.name: Gamwich Crown Texture - 2k
plugins.descr:
Alternative texture for the crown made by Gamwich. 2048x2048 texture resolution.

              Don't choose any option or for Mod Organizer users choose "None" below, if you prefer the vanilla textures or have a different texture replacer installed for Barenziah's Crown. Will only affect the gold base, not the gems.

plugins.name: fadingsignal Jewelry Box Texture
plugins.descr:
Retexture of the box by fadingsignal. 2k textures, 1k normal maps.

              Don't choose either option or for Mod Organizer users choose "None" below, if you prefer the vanilla textures (yikes), or have a different texture replacer installed for the Stone of Barenziah jewelry box. Will only affect the gold base, my gems point to custom texture paths.

plugins.name: Gamwich Jewelry Box Texture - 1k
plugins.descr:
Retexture of the box by Gamwich. Texture resolution is 1024x1024.

              Don't choose either option or for Mod Organizer users choose "None" below, if you prefer the vanilla textures (yikes), or have a different texture replacer installed for the Stone of Barenziah jewelry box. Will only affect the box, my gems point to custom texture paths.

plugins.name: Gamwich Jewelrybox Texture - 2k
plugins.descr:
Retexture of the box by Gamwich. Texture resolution is 2048x2048.

              Don't choose either option or for Mod Organizer users choose "None" below, if you prefer the vanilla textures (yikes), or have a different texture replacer installed for the Stone of Barenziah jewelry box. Will only affect the gold base, my gems point to custom texture paths.

plugins.name: Original
plugins.descr: Choose this option if you prefer my original texture for the Stone of Barenziah. Will only affect the gem itself, not the box (set in previous options).

plugins.name: Gamwich Gem Texture - bright
plugins.descr: Retexture of the gem by Gamwich, adds lots of surface detail and tiny facets. Texture resolution is 512x512. Will only affect the gem itself, not the box (set in previous option above). Also currently does not affect the restored crown.

plugins.name: Gamwich Gem Texture - dark
plugins.descr: Retexture of the gem by Gamwich, adds lots of surface detail and tiny facets. Texture resolution is 512x512.  Will only affect the gem itself, not the box (set in previous option above). Also currently does not affect the restored crown.

plugins.name: Install all of the footstep sounds
plugins.descr: This will install all of the new footstep sounds.

plugins.name: Let me choose which footsteps sounds to install
plugins.descr: This will let you choose which sounds to install in the next step.

groups.name: Choose which animal footsteps you want to install

plugins.name: Bear
plugins.descr: Slightly louder than vanilla.

plugins.name: Bear
plugins.descr: Slightly louder than vanilla.

plugins.name: Chaurus
plugins.descr: Slightly softer than vanilla

plugins.name: Cow
plugins.descr: Slightly slower/gentler than vanilla, since they mainly amble around at a lesuirely pace. Also slightly deeper.

plugins.name: Fox and Wolf
plugins.descr: Quieter and gentler than vanilla, as befitting stalking predators with soft feet. Please note that foxes and wolves share the same footstep sounds, due to the way Bethesda designed the game.

plugins.name: Hare/rabbit
plugins.descr: Significantly quieter than vanilla. Barely perceptible.

plugins.name: Horker
plugins.descr: Deeper and bassier than vanilla. slight increase of reverb, since Horkers are usually found around walls of ice.

plugins.name: Horse/Deer/Elk
plugins.descr: Slightly boomier and louder than vanilla. Please note that horses, deer and elk all share the same sounds, due to how Bethesda designed the game. Note also that horses use a unique and separate set of sounds when sprinting. This mod does not change the horse sprinting sounds, as I thought they were fine already.

plugins.name: Mammoth
plugins.descr: Bassier, deeper, and slightly louder than vanilla. Now you'll know why the screen shakes when one walks by.

plugins.name: Mudcrab
plugins.descr: Slightly softer than vanilla.

plugins.name: Skeever
plugins.descr: Slightly softer than vanilla.

plugins.name: Spider - regular
plugins.descr: No longer sounds like it's hobbling/skipping/doing a jig. Now sounds like it's creeping on many legs, and is quieter.

plugins.name: Spider - large
plugins.descr: Similar to regular spider, but a bit louder.

plugins.name: Spriggan
plugins.descr: Slightly softer than vanilla.

plugins.name: Troll
plugins.descr: Has had some human footstep sounds subtly mixed in, to make it sound slightly more humanoid

plugins.name: Pets of Skyrim - cats
plugins.descr: If you have the Pets of Skyrim mod installed, selecting this option will make the cats from that mod have quieter, softer, barely perceptible footsteps. If you don't have Pets of Skyrim (or if you uninstall it later), these files won't do anything, but they won't harm your game either.

hjVpXm4Owdd2ble4+BsoTfbHe8O8uALfPPsB9pJc.modulename: Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack SSE

plugins.name: Default Replacement
plugins.descr: Installs texture options that most closely resemble vanilla's default colors and patterns. One click install!

plugins.name: Bellyache's Choice
plugins.descr:
Don't want default replacements and don't desire to choose your own? This is a selection of animals and creatures chosen by yours truly! If you trust me to make good choices, pick this option. One click install!

Installed with this option are:
- Bears
- Chaurus - Black
- Chicken - Barred
- Dog - Black and white
- Dragonfly
- Elk and Caribou
- Fox (Silver/White)
- Frostbite Spider (Brown Striped/Grey)
- Goat (Shaggy) - White
- Hawk - Common Buzzard
- Highland Cow - Black
- Horker - Light brown
- Horse (All default but Windhelm=Pangare and Markarth=White
- Mammoth - Brown 2K
- Mudcrab - Oblivion
- Rabbit
- Sabre Cat (Striped/White solid)
- Skeever (Healthy Brown/White)
- Werewolf - Black
- Werewolf Eyes - All Iris Brown
- Wolf (Black=Timber/Ice=Light Grey/Red=Brown)

plugins.name: Normal Maps only
plugins.descr:
Select this option if only the Normal Maps are desired.

This will install all of the normal maps from the mod and ONLY the normal maps. It's provided for users who wish to only use the normal maps from this mod and use diffuse maps from another mod.

plugins.name: Custom Install
plugins.descr: Lets you choose which animal and creature textures you want to use in your game. If you don't select "None" for an option, your game will either use the vanilla textures or the textures from another mod for that option. You can resize this window or double click the images for larger previews.

plugins.name: Belted Galloway
plugins.descr:
Replaces the DEFAULT ORANGE HIGHLAND COW with my Belted Galloway retexture. One small issue: tail uses the same texture as the body, so the tail is also banded.

Also includes my brown highland cow retexture for the painted cow. It will not change with the variants.

Credit: original normal map by Mancer.

jDepm9nOtNeIDbuKYOSnU2pOC9zdzfH8ohs1AyS+.modulename: Ambiance - A Vanilla+ Ambient Lighting Overhaul

plugins.name: Next
plugins.descr: Thank you for downloading Ambiance - A Vanilla+ Ambient Lighting Overhaul.

isteps.name: Choose which Plugins you want to install

plugins.name: Ambiance
plugins.descr: Darkens overall ambient lighting and fog colors.

plugins.name: Darker Interior Ambient Fog
plugins.descr: Darkens ambient fog colors without touching ambient light.

plugins.name: Tweaked Light Colors
plugins.descr: Tweaks some light colors (torchlights, candles etc.) to give off slightly more orange/red light.

plugins.name: Install Cabal's Cut (default)
plugins.descr: All items and their variants as preferred by author. Acolyte masks, dragon priest acolytes, hulking draugr, ash guardians, and ash spawn retextured by EmeraldReign.

plugins.name: Custom
plugins.descr: Choose which items and their variants you want to install.

plugins.name: Acolyte Masks
plugins.descr: Retextured by EmeraldReign.

plugins.name: Dragon Priest Acolytes
plugins.descr: Retextured by EmeraldReign.

plugins.name: Hulking Draugr
plugins.descr: Retextured by EmeraldReign.

plugins.name: Ash Spawn
plugins.descr: Retextured by EmeraldReign.

plugins.name: Ash Guardians
plugins.descr: Retextured by EmeraldReign.

plugins.name: Install Cabal's Cut (default)
plugins.descr: All armors and their variants as preferred by author. Includes Glass Variants Lore version and Differently Ebony by Modd3r. Falmer Armor retextured by EmeraldReign.

plugins.name: Custom
plugins.descr: Choose which armors and their variants you want to install.

plugins.name: Hide
plugins.descr: High resolution reskin of hide and studded armors.

plugins.name: Hide - Cabal's Cut
plugins.descr: Cabal's preferred alternate look.

plugins.name: Glass - Variants
plugins.descr: This option adds two new armors to the game - Thalmor Glass Armor (using the Thalmorized Glass textures) and Steel Glass Armor (using the MWV Glass textures). There are two esp files to choose from.

plugins.name: Ebony - Differently
plugins.descr: This option installs the Black Ebony textures and adds two new armors to the game - Gold Ebony Armor (using the Golden Ebony textures) and Silver Ebony Armor (using the Silver Ebony textures). For now, these new armors can only be crafted.

plugins.name: Falmer
plugins.descr: Retextured by EmeraldReign

plugins.name: Standard
plugins.descr: Thalmor Glass Armor and Steel Glass Armor can be obtained in many ways, and all races can craft them.

plugins.name: Lore
plugins.descr: Thalmor Glass Armor and Steel Glass Armor can be obtained in many ways, but only High Elves can craft the Thalmor Glass Armor, and only Nords can craft the Steel Glass Armor.

plugins.name: AI Overhaul 1.8 Scripted (Beta)
plugins.descr: This verion uses scripts to trigger scenes with the dynamic AI. Beta release.

plugins.name: AI Overhaul 1.8 (Recommended)
plugins.descr: The latest updated version without scripts. Requires USSEP and the free CC content.

plugins.name: AI Overhaul Lite
plugins.descr: Lite version. Compatibility friendly. Does not require USSEP or CC content.

plugins.name: AI Overhaul Lite ESL
plugins.descr: ESL Lite version. Compatibility friendly. Does not require USSEP or CC content.

plugins.name: Continue
plugins.descr:
A compatible, vanilla-friendly lookover of every interior cell to stop small homes and shops from sounding like castles and chasms.

Acoustic Space Improvement Fixes edits interior cells to ensure consistency across the vanilla game. Farmhouses no longer share the same reverb profile as caves and epic interiors no longer sound like small family homes.

You are currently installing the Plugin Version of this mod. Remember to check the Miscellaneous section for patches!

plugins.name: Farming
plugins.descr:
These plugins make changes to interior cells added by Creation Club, and later got included in the Anniversary Edition of the game. Specifically, Goldenhills Farm Bunkhouse and Solitude Sewers.

If you bought the Annivesary Upgrade, you probably want to select these options.

plugins.name: Saints and Seducers
plugins.descr:
These plugins make changes to interior cells added by Creation Club, and later got included in the Anniversary Edition of the game. Specifically, Goldenhills Farm Bunkhouse and Solitude Sewers.

If you bought the Annivesary Upgrade, you probably want to select these options.

plugins.name: Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition Patch
plugins.descr:
This plugin resolves conflicts between Acoustic Space Improvement Fixes and the Unofficial Patch.

⚠️ HEADS UP – These records are ITMs. If that doesn't mean anything to you, then carry on. But PLEASE do not remove these in xEdit. It is solely to undo changes in the Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition patch that conflict with this mod aesthetically.

If you're downloading this mod, that means you do actually care about this! Or maybe you want farmhouses to sound like castles.

plugins.name: Reverb Interior Sounds Expansion
plugins.descr: This plugin resolves conflicts between Acoustic Space Improvement Fixes and Reverb Interior Sounds Expansion.

plugins.name: Thank You!
plugins.descr:
Thank you for installing Acoustic Space Improvement Fixes!

Remember to check out the main page for additional patches you may need.

plugins.name: With Thickets
plugins.descr: Default plugin with thickets (added saplings) around Sarethi Farm and elsewhere. Contains no interior modifications.

plugins.name: Without Thickets
plugins.descr: An alternative plugin with no thickets. No interior modifications.

plugins.name: Normal
plugins.descr: Default size trees that match the vanilla tree size.

plugins.name: Big Trees
plugins.descr: Some big, towering trees are added to the mix for more variety. Note that this option may cause a performance hit.

plugins.name: Autumnal
plugins.descr: All aspens have yellow/orange leaves, like in vanilla.

plugins.name: Autumnal Variety
plugins.descr: Most aspens have orange leaves but some more yellow, others more red and some even greener. Note: Increases the VRAM usage.

plugins.name: Summer
plugins.descr: All aspens have green leaves like in summer.

plugins.name: 2K
plugins.descr: 2K resolution for smaller memory footprint.

plugins.name: 4K
plugins.descr: 4K resolution for best details.

plugins.name: Install
plugins.descr: Contains 3D LOD as well as billboard LOD assets. Make sure to install these if you want to use xLODGen or similar to generate your custom LOD.
